Name: Card story
About the game: This game combines DBG with turn-based battle, with Rogue Like elements and multiple endings, you will direct your team to complete battles and explorations in wonderful stories, and use your wisdom and strategies to defeat powerful enemies and explore deeper stories. Game features: · DBG cards: You will determine the direction of each character's development through each card acquisition. The right combination will explode tremendous power, and bloated cards will lead to battle defeat. · Turn-based Battle: Each round will be a round of confrontation, please put the role in the right place to play the greatest role, your formation is very important. · Multi-Ending Story: Every choice you make may determine the direction of the story. Don't let go of any details. Current content: (currently in the early testing stage, more interesting content will be updated later) . Four unique characters, each with 20 unique cards * 14 enemies, 30 different battles . An independent story line There are hundreds of collocations [/h2][/h2] in the card attributes of . . Plan update: (within six months) . Two new roles . 10 enemies . New story line
